lines.text: Exhausted and with his armor bent out of shape, Balthazar the BrassÃ¨d staggers back, leaning on his sword like a cane.
You are. Stronger. Then I thought.
i don't give him the satisfaction of a response.
Ice cold, Hannah! Alright, so you leave Balthazar behind and walk into the DUNGEON.
As the gate THUDs behind you, you find yourself in a room lit by thousands of flickering blue candles.

Suddenly, a poltergeist in [OUTFIT] descends through the ceiling. It gently lifts you off the ground.
